dct_title_s: Hierosolyma, clarissima totius orientis ciuitas, Iudaee metropolis
dct_description_sm: On left of sheet is imaginary topographic description of the ancient city at the time of Jesus Christ; on right side is topographical description of the modern city.
Relief shown by shading, hachures, and pictorially.
From: Civitates orbis terrarum / Georg Braun and Franz Hogenberg. KÃ¶ln, 1572, Vol. I, No. 52 (should read 53), according to Laor.
"The maps are drawn after Laicstain-De Jode's original but without mentioning the names." Laor, p.152.
Inset at bottom right of Moses receiving the Tablets of the Law.
